glosses: stupidly, emptily, like a stuck pig

etymology: Reduplication of aval, of unknown origin, possibly deteriorated from avanak (regional forms; avalak, avalah, avak), which is from Armenian ավանակ (avanak, “donkey”), but this is not certain. Another possible origin could be the Arabic word أَحْوَل ('ahwal') meaning 'cross-eyed' or 'squint-eyed'.
